import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from "react"; import AuthContext from "../../context/autenticacion/authContext"; //Import Breadcrumb import Breadcrumbs from "../../components/Common/Breadcrumb"; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, FormGroup, Button, Label, Input, Container, CustomInput, } from "reactstrap"; import {AvForm, AvField, AvInput} from "availity-reactstrap-validation"; import {countries} from "../../helpers/utils"; import style from "./style.scss"; import {ToastContainer, toast} from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css"; const Profile = (props) => { const notify = () => toast.dark("Wow so easy !"); const authContext = useContext(AuthContext); const {usuario, actualizarUsuario} = authContext; /*Creacion del objeto usuario */ const [user, guardarUsuario] = useState({ name: "", surname: "", email: "", password: "", birthday: "", country: "", image: "", }); const actualizarState = (e) => { guardarUsuario({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const onSubmitProyecto = (e) => { //La claves estan vacias actualizarUsuario(user, usuario._id); }; return (

Editar tu datos personales

{usuario ? usuario.name : null} {usuario ? usuario.surname : null} {usuario ? usuario.email : null} {usuario ? usuario.country : null}
); }; export default Profile;
